alert.note: Alert for Cody Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 25 at 9:55AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Much Colder Temperatures and Snow on the Way... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...Areas of freezing drizzle, below normal temperatures, gusty north wind 15 to 25 mph, and eventual snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Cody Foothills. * WHEN...Colder air continues to filter into the region along with gusty north wind. Areas of freezing drizzle gradually dissipate Wednesday afternoon. Light snow arrives late Wednesday afternoon and evening and persists through Thursday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Daytime highs Wednesday will only be in the 20s. The snow is likely to be heaviest between 2 AM and 10 AM Thursday. Thursday highs only reach the lower 20s.
